title: Feb. 18--54 (Azure)
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. William Block
provenance_text:
Ben Nicholson [1894-1982], St. Ives, Cornwall, England [1]; Mr. [1915-2005] and Mrs. William Block (Maxine Horton Block) [1920-2008], Pittsburgh, PA, January1956 until May 1977 [2]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, May 1977.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 217 in "The 1955 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting" held at Carnegie Institute, October-December 1955. 
[2]. The Blocks purchased the painting from the International for $1,470 (check deposited on January 24, 1956.)
